live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 10:00am. Please stay tuned for updates.
38981.summary: Some customers in the West Heights area of Mission are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38981.title: June 28 – Mission (West Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 1:45pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
38982.summary: Some customers in the Brookfield and Bayview areas of Sault Ste Marie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38982.title: June 28 – Sault Ste Marie (Brookfield and Bayview) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
